column4: hey, when I go Places > any folder, it opens Kaffeine and not nautilus, how can I change that?
right click on any folder > open with other application > open folder
i tried that, but rightclicking in "Places>any folder" does not work, it opens kaffeine as it was a leftclick
I mean right click on any folder on dektop > select Open with other application > select Open folder ( check th bex remeber ) then try to open folder you need
